Y-axis for a discrete scale with 2 values: poorest 40%, richest 60%
X-axis titled 'year' for a discrete scale with 5 values: 2011, 2014, 2017, 2021, 2024
Gradient legend titled '% Adults (age 15+)' for fill color with values from 0 to 100
Title text 'Account Ownership By Income Group (2011-2024)'
Subtitle text 'The percentage of respondents in each income group who saved at a bank or similar financial institution or using a mobile money account in the past year.'

text.tspan: The percentage of respondents in each income group
who saved at a bank or similar financial institution
or using a mobile money account in the past year.
